title: THE THREE LIVES OF THOMASINA Re-seeded
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0057579/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0057579/</a>


Once again this is a new seed to correct my last upload error. Unfortunately I couldn't upload using the same file name. I hope no one has to start from scratch again. I'm truly sorry for my mistake.


A young Scottish girl's cat, Thomasina, apparently dies at the hands of her widowed veterinarian father. The strained relationship between the girl and her father is eventually repaired with the return of Thomasina and the aid of a beautiful and mysterious "witch" who seems to have powers to revive and heal animals.


This is a complete DVD rip which includes all the extras. Just download and burn.
